comments.text: Marlon , maybe you have amnesia because i remember your honest reaction for hunters gathering. But now you embarrass yourself being hypocrite with this clickbait thumbnail? You are better than that. As a gaming show it was a 7. Great announcement , many shown before, multiple times, 95 percent multiplat and Sony didnt show up at all. Because when the creator david jaffey of god of war say what the F was Santa Monica Thinking, then you know its a problem. So charging 30 bucks for a gameboy game when other metroidvania wiping the floor with that ps5 pro footage, castlevania, replaced, Ori, silksong, song of iron, the list is endless. So deep in your gamer heart you know the answer. The question is being true to yourself is important to you or not! Jubby aka jaydub will never be honest. He is corporate slave . But i really hope the remake of og god of war which is in early development do honor the fantastic magic we all love and remember. Fingers crossed.
comments.author: @truegamer7930

comments.text: Whoever said that state of play was bad are trolling or lying. This was impressive to say the least. You have to be a very boring person if you think this is bad.
